title: Actors' Equity Implements $9 Minimum Wage For LA's Small Theaters
teaser: Less than a week after union members in LA overwhelmingly rejected a proposal to make small theaters pay their performers minimum wage, Actors' Equity decided to go ahead and implement it anyway. Many say the move could force many 99-seat theaters in LA to close.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
